content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment for your stay in Munich. I am open to discussing the rental price with you, but I must emphasize that as a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains. Please let me know what rental price you have in mind.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. Can you tell me the price you have in mind?

Keep in mind that I am a student and a responsible tenant, so I am willing to pay a reasonable price for a decent apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest, Hassan. As a landlord, I am looking to get the best possible rental price for my apartment. However, I am also willing to be reasonable and take into account your needs as a student and responsible tenant. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am currently asking for a rental price of 800 Euros per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
800 Euros per month is too high for me as a student. I am looking for something lower. Can you offer me a lower rental price?

Please keep in mind that I am a responsible tenant, and I am willing to pay a reasonable price for a decent apartment.

Also, I am willing to sign a long term lease agreement to secure the rental price for me.

Please let me know if there is any other information I can provide to you that would help us come to an agreement.

Thank you.

Best regards,

Hassan Rahman.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your response, Hassan. I understand your concerns as a student and your willingness to sign a long-term lease agreement. Based on your needs, I am willing to offer you a lower rental price. I am open to discussing a rental price of 700 Euros per month for the apartment. This rental price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as your status as a responsible tenant. I believe this rental price is reasonable and would allow you to secure a decent apartment for your stay in Munich. Would you be interested in this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
